animeList.title: Ouran High School Host Club
animeList.comment: Very gay (complimentary), very charming, and very enjoyable.

summary: Oh by the way I love Gintama. In case you didn't know, Gintama is my favorite Anime of all time. Did I ever mention Gintama is my top 1 rated Anime?

animeList.title: Mushishi
animeList.comment: Mushishi sets its atmosphere up perfectly, it feels like that one distant dream that gives you the warm and fuzzy feels all over.

summary: Not exaggerating here but I think the most tranquil state of mind that I've been in the past couple of years was most likely whenever I was listening to Mushishi's wonderful OPs, EDs, and OST.

animeList.title: Howl's Moving Castle
animeList.comment: Yet another beautiful and charming Ghibli tale, also one of my personal favorites. There's a moment in the movie that is guaranteed to make me tear up!

animeList.title: Monster
animeList.comment: One of the first series that I watched, hooked me since episode 1 and despite its length, did not feel like a chore to binge.

animeList.title: Paranoia Agent
animeList.comment: Satoshi Kon take an L challenge (IMPOSSIBLE).

animeList.title: Samurai Champloo
animeList.comment: It passes the vibe check with extra credit, go listen to the ED right now.

animeList.title: Planetes
animeList.comment: A unique and fascinating story, solid Sci-Fi Anime.

animeList.title: Kino's Journey
animeList.comment: Quite a charming tale, a journey with no destination, thoroughly enjoyable start to finish.

summary: The year I was born! Quote of the year: 「世界は美しくなんかない。そしてそれ故に、美しい」, or "The world is not beautiful. And that, in a way, lends it a sort of beauty", from Kino's Journey.

animeList.title: Azumanga Daioh
animeList.comment: An awesome Slice of Life Anime, and really damn funny. Also has one of my favorite characters: Osaka (she's just like me fr) o.o

animeList.title: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex
animeList.comment: GitS is a classic, and SAC did not miss at all in terms of story nor character. A pleasant cyberpunk treat! I also highly recommend the original movie.

animeList.title: Detective Conan: Phantom of Baker Street
animeList.comment: Even though I have my qualms with Detective Conan, I cannot get myself to hate its early content, especially this movie. It took the premise and went full creative mode, definitely a childhood favorite! The case itself was not the strongest however which is a shame.

summary: Don't watch Detective Conan outside of this movie and the early episodes pls, it'll be a journey you end up regretting.

animeList.title: Spirited Away
animeList.comment: One of my few 10/10s, does not get old however many times I rewatch. A Ghibli classic in every way and one of Miyazaki's best.

summary: Not much to say here, if you have not seen Spirited Away yet what are you doing really? Go watch it!

animeList.title: FLCL
animeList.comment: It's bizzare but it works! Great animation and awesome experience.

animeList.title: Jin-Roh
animeList.comment: A wonderfully crafted tragedy, the ending segment sent chills down my spine, the pace is rather slow and it's rather violent though, be warned.

summary: Can't say I watched that many entries from this year, this was before I was born!
